briefTitle: Nature Sounds as a Pain and Anxiety Reducing Strategy in Patients Undergoing Breast Core Biopsy
officialTitle: Nature Sounds as a Pain and Anxiety Reducing Strategy in Patients Undergoing Breast Core Biopsy: A Randomized Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Measure of psychologic stress of patients and staff
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 1) ≥ 21 years old
* 2) present for CNB
* 3) to be able to read and speak English
* 4) provide written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

-
